title: 31 Living-Room Décor Ideas Under 2019
text:
Photo: Courtesy of Amazon

If you’re a certifiable binge-watcher, couch potato, or homebody, you probably spend a lot of time in your living room. And while we’ve already explored the world of cheap-but-expensive-looking apartment décor, bathroom décor, kitchen décor, and bedroom décor, we’ve now moved on to the living room. Below, lots of little things that’ll have a big impact on your space, from a multitiered coffee table to a velvety pillow.

1972 Munich Olympic Games, by David Hockney Here’s a David Hockney poster that’s not the David Hockney poster everyone has. $30 at Amazon Buy $30 at Amazon Buy

BEACH'D Large Macrame Rope Crochet Boho Wall Hanging This wall hanging will add a little texture to your room. $59 at Amazon Buy $59 at Amazon Buy

Modway Render Mid-Century Modern Low Profile 44 Inch TV Stand in Walnut Half of this TV stand will hide unsightly wires and cords, while the other half will display your tchotchkes. $145 at Amazon Buy $145 at Amazon Buy

BERTERI Ashtray Lips A very fun set of lips as an ashtray — great even if you’ve never touched a cigarette. $24 at Amazon Buy $24 at Amazon Buy

Ryan Rove Ashley Oval Two-Tier Glass Coffee Table $64 (was $70, now 9% off) In the right apartment — maybe one a bit more normcore than this — the tiered glass coffee table would make quite the statement. $64 at Amazon Buy $64 at Amazon Buy

The Labyrinth by Saul Steinberg First published in 1960 and long out of print until it was revived last fall, this book collects a broad swath of Steinberg’s drawings, with an introduction by Nicholson Baker and afterword by Harold Rosenberg. It wouldn’t go wrong on any coffee table. $17 at Amazon Buy $17 at Amazon Buy

Umbra Bolo Wall and Ceiling Planter And if you don’t have a ton of floor space, these plant hangers are great to suspend your new plant friends from the ceiling. $33 at Amazon Buy $33 at Amazon Buy

Now House by Jonathan Adler Small Cloud Pottery Vase An elegant vase option from Jonathan Adler that would make bodega flowers look nice. From $28 at Amazon Buy From $28 at Amazon Buy

description: A roundup of living room décor items from Amazon 2019 that look a lot more expensive than they actually are including Armen Living LCSUCHWACH Summer Chair in Charcoal Fabric, BERTERI Ashtray Lips, and Umbra Hub Wall Mirror With Rubber Frame.
